column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////It's in Midtown off Louisiana next to Piola on the ground floor of the Mix @ Midtown mixed use complex that has the 24 Hour Fitness up on the top floor. They all share a tiny parking garage that fills up rather quickly. The parking situation isn't great but if it won't scare me off for the gym
column2: it won't scare me off for food which I like much better than the exercise.
